Title: Demo of distributing users and ssh pubkeys to AWS cloud instances.
Description:
WARNING: please set the browser zoom to 100% to view the screen cast correctly. I found chrome at 100% gives the best viewing experience.

I push out some user accounts to already existing AWS instances, that have been bootstrapped to Hosted Chef.

prerequisites are that you

  1. have a configured chef workstation
  2. configured euca2ools
  3. chef-server with chef-client and ssh-users cookbooks uploaded
